titlestmt.titleproper: Planned Parenthood Federation of America Records (PPFA II): SERIES VIII. Foreign, 1952-79
titlestmt.subtitle: Finding Aid
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Amanda Izzo.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded in NoteTab Pro. Encoded by Margaret Jessup. 2009-02-05

did.head: Collection Overview
did.unittitle: Planned Parenthood Federation of America Records (PPFA II): SERIES VIII. Foreign
did.abstract: The Foreign Series includes correspondence, as well as conference, reference, and subject files related to international planned parenthood. This Series forms part of the PPFA II Records

scopecontent.p: This Series forms part of the PPFA II Records

Correspondence; and conference, reference, and subject files related to international planned parenthood issues make up this series. An IPPF conference is included as well as alphabetical subject files (including abortion). International family planning projects, most administered by Family Planning International Assistance (a PPFA sub-organization with an international focus), are filed alphabetically by country.
NOTE: To view the series descriptions and contents lists, click on the series links below. Some files are quite large and may take several minutes to load, depending on your internet connection.

arrangement.p: This collection is organized into ten series:

accessrestrict.p: PPFA has closed records created January 1, 1985 or later, with the exception of many published materials which are open to research. All records having to do with clinic defense and security are closed. PPFA has closed a small section of files in box 206 for fifty years. Researchers may request access to restricted materials from PPFA.

userestrict.p: PPFA has retained copyright ownership of their records, although the Sophia Smith Collection has been authorized to grant permission to researchers to publish from any of the PPFA Records. Permission must be obtained to publish reproductions or quotations beyond "fair use."

prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Planned Parenthood Federation of America Records, Sophia Smith Collection, Smith College, Northampton, Mass.

altformavail.p: The Margaret Sanger Papers Microfilm Edition: Smith College Collection Series, edited by Esther Katz, et al., University Publications of America, 1995

accruals.p: Periodic additions to the collection are expected.

acqinfo.p: PPFA deposited these records in 1988. Various departments have since sent miscellaneous additions.

processinfo.p: Preliminary processing done by Amanda Izzo, 2001.
Recent additions to this collection are unprocessed and are not reflected in the finding aid.

relatedmaterial.p: This Series forms part of the PPFA II Records
See also the PPFA I Records.
Related material can be found in the Margaret Sanger Papers, Sophia Smith Collection, Smith College, and at the Library of Congess.
